name: Superseedbox
description: Seedbox packages for bitcoins.Need ultimate upload speed for your torrents? A machine that is on 24/7 to meet your bittorrent tracker ratio needs but leaving your home PC and bandwidth free? Does your ISP shape traffic? Are you a producer who wants to keep the cost of getting your product online down? Or are you a serious uploader stuck with an bad Internet Service Provider, or maybe you’re at college?If any of the above is true then a seedbox would help in these aspects.When using a seedbox, your home PC doesn't require any special software – your concerns over the RIAA or MPAA targeting you are gone. No more worrying about letters from your ISP – and better yet, no legal letters will be coming your way either. Not only is your uploading traffic offloaded from your home computer to the seedbox, but with a Virtual Private Network connection you can send all your Internet traffic through your seedbox through an encrypted channel.All dedicated seedboxes come bursting with features including; a music and video streaming private site for you to play music or watch movies through your web browser right from your seedbox. VNC gives you a remote desktop which lets you use your seedbox as if you were sitting directly in front of it, with web browsing software, encoders, IRC clients and more.Because of the very high speeds, seedboxes are very popular on private torrent trackers, where keeping a good ratio above 1:1 is the rule. Each of our unmetered seedboxes can both upload and download over 1TB of data every day. description: My name is Benjamin Rees and i'm the general director of Windorbreez, a Web Design and Development group based out of beautiful Vancouver, BC. We have decided to branch out and put our money (and livelihood) where our mouths are. We believe in bitcoin, and think that a great way to help it grow is to accept it as payment ourselves!We are fortunate to have enough regular work to be able to branch out and take a bit of a risk. Then again, our team is built by risk takers! We would ideally love to help launch bitcoin related sites, but we will absolutely do normal web design and development!We build scalable frameworks built from the ground up with the best and most effective SEO practices. name: Prince peter collection
description: In September 2009, Prince Peter Collection was launched in New York City.The inspiration for the first collection came from Mick Rocks' iconic music and fashion images. Together, Prince Peter and Mick Rock took10 images from rock n' roll history to create the Spring/Summer 2010 collection, with particular pieces inspired by music greats David Bowie and Syd Barrett.Then in February 2010, for his Fall/Winter show, Prince Peter decided to embrace and celebrate the wildly influential and successful New York City Venues and after-hours clubs of the 1980s, such as Danceteria, The Pyramid Club, The Mudd Club, and the Palladium. He named the collection ‘Virgin Spirit' in honor of certain notable and emerging celebrities from that era, such as Madonna, Culture Club, Keith Haring and Jean-Michel Basquiat.Prince Peter unveiled his Spring/Summer 2011 through a recreation of Andy Warhol's Factory in a private downtown Manhattan loft. This time the collection drew inspiration from an era when the City was both a muse and a canvas for artists and musicians to make their mark and create their own legacy on future jilted generations to come. The Factory meets Max's Kansas City, celebrating all darlings of the underground and remembered in true rock n' roll fashion.The collection has since launched in Los Angeles, Miami, Dallas and Chicago. The brand officially went international in 2011, and has gained a huge following in Japan and Germany.Prince Peter's rock n' roll inspired t-shirt line, conceived in New York City, has already developed a huge celebrity following. Everyone, from pop-star Rihanna to U2 front man Bono, Katy Perry, Russell Brand, Taylor Momsen, Lil Wayne, and Melanie Laurent, has been seen sporting Prince Peter t-shirts.All Prince Peter Collection products are hand-made in the United States and appeal to both men and woman of all ages and demographics. The fabrics are airy and light, easy to tailor, layer and wear in all seasons. As Prince Peter has said, "the line is rock n' roll t-shirts, plain and simple, and that's good to have during this tough economy."Phone: +1 212 796 4018site link: http://www.princepetercollection.com/

name: Shatto & sons custom t-shirts
description: Shatto and Sons is a family owned establishment located along the Pacific coast Hwy in Leucadia, CA.We have been providing the community with quality T-shirt art and apparel for over 35 years, since our father Jim Shatto first opened the doors in 1975. Back then we were known as Deluxe Airbrush; everything we made was hand painted, and we quickly earned a name for ourselves. In the 80′s and 90′s, our focus shifted from airbrush to silkscreen, in order to adapt to the evolving industry.We changed our name to Shatto & Sons when two of the three Shatto boys began working part-time. We’re still in the same location and the shop is managed by Ryan Shatto. Jim retired in 2008. He’s still surfing regularly and has picked up sailing. He continues to do our airbrush painted calendar every year, a tradition he started in 1978. We offer unique and affordable clothing ,with original designs depicting many of the local towns and beaches in North County. We also offer custom screen-printing , embroidery, and digital printing in any quantity. See our Services section for more details.In addition to clothing, our shop now incorporates the “Surf Hut” Art Gallery, featuring photography and paintings by local artists Sterling King, Bob Merson, and Alan Casagrande.Phone: 760-436-5542site link: http://www.shattoandsons.com/

name: Afikyiri edjua: backyard marketplace
description: This site is connected to the Artisans that work day after day creating art at the Art Center in the coastal Ghanaian City of Accra.They have been there, selling their art for at least the last 60 years when some Hausa people from Nigeria set up the market.Afikyiri Edjua roughly translates to Backyard Market. Afikyiri being Backyard, Edjua being market. In practice, this would be a market that the government and laws would have little control over. Folks might use barter here, buy and sell things they would not rush to buy elsewhere, plan events... etc. We are bring the Afikyiri onto the internet.There are hundreds of people who get their living from their art made at the art center. Much of the money paid for items here goes right back to them to get more items. In the future, we plan to get way more items on the store, as well as being able to make new custom items. The workers and potential is there, and with the onset of Bitcoin, it will be easier than ever to build business and people up all around the world.site link: http://www.edjua.com/

name: The jewelry vault & loan
Iz4
description:
IZ4 jewellery studio brings together the latest technology of 3D printing in precious metals with the genuine

 
 creativity and craftsmanship powered by 3D modelling tools. The miniature wearable art work is often inspired by natural forms, composed of rigorous complex geometry and suggesting a possible coherent anatomy and yet unlike anything in our ecosystem.Iza Grunberg is a jewellery designer living and working in Berlin, creating explorative, innovative, beautiful objects working in new processes combining observation, computer assisted modelling and bespoke 3D printing. Before setting up her own studio, Iza developed similar processes working with artist Wim Delvoye developing his world-famous, large scale pieces for institutions like the Louvre (Paris), Sperone Westwater (New York), MONA (Tasmania). The studio exists to explore possibilities around the production of precious objects using digital tools in a process that is thoroughly artisanal. The work references the forms of geometries of nature while touching the limits of what is possible technologically. Pieces are offered in limited edition. Bespoke pieces are possible by commission.Iza's studio is just north of Mauerpark, in the district of Prenzlauer Berg. This former "Death Zone" of the Berlin wall, has become a hangout for the young alternative scene of Berlin, attracting musicians, basketball players, hawkers and improvised nightlife -- it has also become notorious for the Walpurgis Night riots in recent years.Address: Malmöer Straße 26, 10439 Berlin, Germanysite link: http://izagrun.com/

name: Color-glide
description:
Laguna Hills, California, Nov. 2013 - A major home improvement survey recently revealed
 
 household painting as one of the most avoided home projects, ranked just behind cleaning junk out of the garage, clearing a rain gutter, and washing dirty windows. Though painting with a paintbrush is a relatively easy task, paint jobs are avoided because of the time consuming preparation and clean up. It is also difficult to match colors, sheens, and blend out brush marks.Color-Glide Pro is a new brushless painting system that allows for controlled painting right up to edges and corners without multiple trips to a paint can.  The paint flow from the applicator tube is self-controlled, just like squeezing a tube of toothpaste. There is no preparation time, no setup, and no cleanup.  Best of all, any paint color or type can be used with the applicator.Color-Glide Pro is perfect for covering scratches and scuffs, as well as small paint projects. Inventor Scott Stevenson says, “Color-Glide Pro is simple by design; it solves common problems and hassles associated with painting and provides more cost-effectiveness and convenience than a paintbrush.”When users are finished painting, they can wipe the applicator with a paper towel and cap the tube until future use. The Color-Glide Pro is a great way to organize leftover paint and get rid of old, half-full paint cans.“The best way to use Color-Glide Pro tubes is to fill the tubes right after the room is painted,” says Stevenson. “Just fill up a few Color-Glide Pro tubes and then discard the big and ugly paint can that normally is stored in the garage. Painting is now less intimidating.”Barb Webb of RuralMom.com raves, "No mess, no drips and minimal clean-up after. I put the cap on the paint tube to re-use later and simply rinsed out the pump with warm water. Color-Glide Pro will remain a valued addition to my ‘do-it-yourself’ tool set for crafts and also for upcoming house painting projects. It will be so convenient to have a mess-free tool for painting touch-ups and help with surface areas like doors and window frames.""You could get out a paintbrush to cover scuffs when you see them, but if you are anything like me, the thought of opening the can of paint, stirring it, painting a scuff, cleaning your paintbrush...you get the idea. I never did it, just lived with the scuffs," commented another Color-Glide Pro user.Color-Glide® Pro tubes and transfer pumps are made from recyclable materials. The applicators are available in both medium and large sizes, and are sold in Single, DualPacks, and QuadPacks.Address: 24001 Calle De La Magdalena, Laguna Hills, CA 92654, USAPhone: +1 949 480 9045 site link: http://colorglidepro.com/

name: Raketa
description: Russia’s historical watch factory Raketa, began accepting Bitcoins.Raketa was founded in 1721 by Peter the Great and is the oldest factory in Russia.  For almost 300 years, Raketa, formerly known as Petrodvorets Watch Factory, has produced and sold wristwatches to individuals in Russian and those around the world.  Petrodvorets Watch Factory was renamed Raketa in 1961 to honor the World’s first cosmonaut Yuri Gagarin.  Yuri was the first human to travel to outer space.Over the years Raketa’s watches have been produced for the members of the Red Army, Soviet Navy, North Pole expeditions and civilians.  Not only is Raketa respected by Russian leadership, but also popular with the public having an array of watch designs from practical to fashionable.  Raketa even has the last remaining watchmaking school and operates this training program in conjunction with the Saint Petersberg Technical Institute.Raketa produces all mechanical movements in-house, setting this watch factory apart.  Raketa is now unique in an even more significant way in that it currently stands as the only watch factory to date accepting Bitcoins for payment.Address: Saint-Petersburg Prospect, 60, Petrodvorets, Saint-Petersburg, Russia, 198516Phone : +7 926 633 73 68site link: http://world.raketa-shop.com/ / http://www.raketa.com/

name: Young pioneer tours
description: Budget tours to destinations other companies do not dare to.We at Young Pioneer Tours started from humble beginnings as a group of expats living in China brought together by our love of being on the road. By the nature of our own travel we learnt what makes and breaks a good trip, which made starting our tours much easier. Now, years down the line and countless tours behind us, we have tweaked and experimented with our tours to best fulfil what you guys out there are looking for, making a lot of new friends and having some interesting and bizarre experiences along the way. We try to find ways to keep our tours as cheap as possible, to encourage all walks of life to come and see our destinations, a factor that has been key in the growth of YPT.All our group tours come with an experienced YPT guide who gives you the opportunity to do things you couldn't do without them there to make it happen – something which is of utmost importance when off the beaten track. We have a great reputation for awfully fun guides who bring out the travel bug in people while ensuring that everything runs smoothly.There is an attitude to travel commonly associated with experienced backpackers which we fully believe in; going out of your way to help others on the road, share experiences and make friends wherever you can. It’s this attitude which has opened doors to us that can’t be opened in other ways. Our guides have developed close bonds with the local guides and our regular customers, while maintaining the professionalism required to make everything come together to give people great memories and stories to go home with.Opening doors for people and bringing together like-minded travellers has become our main driving force and always pushes us to get the most out of each destination at a budget price. We love what we do and the community we are involved in and will keep trying to push the envelope for opening tourism in places often forgotten.Address: Room 2003, Unit 3-3, Saigao Block, Fengcheng Wu Lu, Weiyang District, Xi'an, Shaanxi. name: Gite de la fontaine barry aveyron
description:
The “Gite de la Fontaine” (or, “the guesthouse by the fountain”) is ideally located to visit Aveyron

 

 and the Levezou lake district.It is located in a hamlet of a dozen houses where only local residents use the one road. Children will come and go safely on foot, on bikes or on their scooters.The guesthouse has a private parking spot, a small garden set back from the road to enjoy the outsides, and a fireplace if you choose to come in the off-season. The house is fully independent. The bedrooms are upstairs, while the living rooms are on the ground floor. The two bedrooms have exposed beams and stones which give them a hushed charm. The parents’ room is fitted with a double bed, while the children’s is equipped with two single beds and a folding one for a third child if necessary. The bathroom and the toilets separate the two rooms. The bathroom is fitted with a wide shower and a washbasin.Downstairs, there are a fully equipped kitchen, a living room, a dining room with a fireplace and a television...The guesthouse is a former farm shed which we renovated in 2010-2011. We kept the old stones from the walls as well as the wood beams. The rest was renovated using natural materials, such as lime plaster and brickwork, solid wood parquet floors, untreated pine paneling, organic paint on partitions, insulation made with sheep’s wool from the village.The guesthouse is fully independent, but we live nearby so we will be there if you need us.
A short trail goes round Barry; it will take you to the fountain, and the yards where the local inhabitants raise various animals.The guesthouse has been fitted with modern devices: hot water, induction plates, dishwasher, washing machine, pyrolysis oven, microwave etc. The teak garden furniture, protected by an arbor will provide for a Manet-like outdoor lunch.The beds come with duvets; equipment for infants is provided for free, such as a high chair, a folding bed, a trail-sturdy stroller.The guesthouse is heated with electric heaters and an open-hearthed insert fireplace. Wood is complimentary.Should you decide to go mountain biking, we’ll be glad to keep your gear safe in our barn. We’ll also hand you maps to go on fun rides of your chosen length.The guesthouse has unlimited wired Internet access (the cable is provided free of charge).Location: Barry, 12290 Le Vibal, Francesite link: http://www.gite-aveyron-barry.fr/

name: Teddy bear hostel in riga - latvia
description:
Located in the very heart of Old Riga (VecRiga), family owned, very safe and peaceful.Teddy’s Riga takes a pride to reside in renowned historical dwelling, The House of Johannes Reitern. Built in 1684-1688 by rich town hall member Johann Reitern and by city architect R. Bindenschuh, Northern-Baroque style masterpiece boasts elaborate stone carvings along main splendid façade on Mārstaļu street. The house was completely restored in 1986-1990, so no need to worry about crumbling ceiling.As the building is of major historical importance, certain modern amenities are limited or restricted by the law. Both Teddy and you shall be reaching the home on foot, elevators were not invented in the year 1688!! Everyone needs some exercise, so take your steps up and return from Riga more healthy and fit! Reception and dorm rooms are set up on third floor; double rooms are on forth floor. No-one resides on floors one, two and three, so you have the whole space for your own fun! For most adventurous guests we keep the keys of cellar and romantic attic, which can be privately admired.Exact FREE facilities included in your stay are:
free wi-fi,free PC/Internet,free herbal tea unbounded supply,free continental =simple breakfast,free clean linen/pillows,free blankets,free power converters at reception,free hairdryer in each bath,free Riga guide maps,free luggage storage,fully equipped kitchens with fridge, oven for special cake, wine bottles openers, microwave,two fully equipped bathrooms,washing machine for nominal charge,necessities (like shampoo) for nominal charge,24-hours reception with dedicated staff, speaking English, Latvian, Russian.Address: 3, Vecpilsētas, Riga, LatviaPhone: +371-672-29-250site link: http://www.teddyhostelriga.com/

name: Pacific tradewinds hostel - san francisco
description:
A small, friendly San Francisco Backpacker Hostel.For some travellers the journey is more important than the destination and who you meet is more important than the sights you see. Pacific Tradewinds Backpacker Hostel was specifically designed for fun loving, social, international travelers who truly enjoy hosteling. If you are this type of traveler and like to make new friends, we'd love to meet you and welcome you to this unique community for international travelers.We provide a full range of services and features to make your stay really comfortable. Our kitchen is modern and fully equipped for making real meals. The bathrooms are bright, clean and private. Beds are made of solid steel (which means no shaking or squeaking) and have backpack sized lockers underneath.Finally, the location is great. We are located just 2 blocks from the Downtown Transamerica Pyramid, one block from the Cable Cars, a few blocks from Chinatown and North Beach, and buses to everywhere are just outside our door.
This hostel is primarily popular with 'off-the-beaten-path' backpackers and these are the sort of travelers we love to have. We frequently fill up early in the day, so it's best to make a reservation for at least your first night.  If you are not sure when you'll be in San Francisco, give us a call when you arrive since we always try to save a few beds for spontaneous travelers.If you pay with Bitcoins, you will get 10 percent off.  Please see our 
FAQ for more information about reserving and paying by Bitcoin.Address: 680 Sacramento Street, San Francisco, CA 94111, USAPhone: +1 (415) 433-7970Toll-Free (Within U.S.): 1-888-734-6783site link: http://www.san-francisco-hostel.com/

name: Gite de la fontaine barry aveyron
description:
The “Gite de la Fontaine” (or, “the guesthouse by the fountain”) is ideally located to visit Aveyron

 

 and the Levezou lake district.It is located in a hamlet of a dozen houses where only local residents use the one road. Children will come and go safely on foot, on bikes or on their scooters.The guesthouse has a private parking spot, a small garden set back from the road to enjoy the outsides, and a fireplace if you choose to come in the off-season. The house is fully independent. The bedrooms are upstairs, while the living rooms are on the ground floor. The two bedrooms have exposed beams and stones which give them a hushed charm. The parents’ room is fitted with a double bed, while the children’s is equipped with two single beds and a folding one for a third child if necessary. The bathroom and the toilets separate the two rooms. The bathroom is fitted with a wide shower and a washbasin.Downstairs, there are a fully equipped kitchen, a living room, a dining room with a fireplace and a television...The guesthouse is a former farm shed which we renovated in 2010-2011. We kept the old stones from the walls as well as the wood beams. The rest was renovated using natural materials, such as lime plaster and brickwork, solid wood parquet floors, untreated pine paneling, organic paint on partitions, insulation made with sheep’s wool from the village.The guesthouse is fully independent, but we live nearby so we will be there if you need us.
A short trail goes round Barry; it will take you to the fountain, and the yards where the local inhabitants raise various animals.The guesthouse has been fitted with modern devices: hot water, induction plates, dishwasher, washing machine, pyrolysis oven, microwave etc. The teak garden furniture, protected by an arbor will provide for a Manet-like outdoor lunch.The beds come with duvets; equipment for infants is provided for free, such as a high chair, a folding bed, a trail-sturdy stroller.The guesthouse is heated with electric heaters and an open-hearthed insert fireplace. Wood is complimentary.Should you decide to go mountain biking, we’ll be glad to keep your gear safe in our barn. We’ll also hand you maps to go on fun rides of your chosen length.The guesthouse has unlimited wired Internet access (the cable is provided free of charge).Location: Barry, 12290 Le Vibal, Francesite link: http://www.gite-aveyron-barry.fr/

The building dates back to the fifteenth century and reached its present shape at the end dell'800. 'The Church of Up' is the ideal place to explore the appennino Faenza and the park of the Vena Gessi Romagnoli. Guests will find the facility here all the information and tips on hiking in the area is hilly and mountainous in the surrounding caves, cultural visits to museums and Geos, insights on festivals, events and appointments. Is possible to make some interesting trips to Monte Battaglia, of the Vena Gessi and along the route of the Corolla Ginestre directly from home.In B & B there are two rooms (one double and one double) the structure also provides an extensive library, a study room with internet access wi-fi and space for meetings and screenings. There is available a climbing wall where artificial training or just try to move the first steps in the vertical dimension.Church of the Above is a place to relax and enjoy the small pleasures of the season. It will be possible to taste typical products and as home-made jams, cakes, preserves, etc.Via Monte Fortino 1, Casola Valsenio - Ravenna, ItalyPhone: +39 0546 73836site link: http://blog.libero.it/lachiesadisopra/

name: Cheapsleep helsinki
description:
CheapSleep is an authentic hostel opened in May 2012. Totally renovated, you'll find CheapSleep Helsinki a great place
 
 to get some sleep and meet interesting fellow travellers passing through Helsinki.A large common room is a key to what makes CheapSleep a fun, relaxed and social place to stay. Our hostel has a fully equipped kitchen and a dining area next to the common room, plus there's a supermarket on-site.We offer a mix of dorms and private double rooms. We have 118 dorm beds split between 7 rooms, with the smallest being 10-beds and the largest 26-beds.Each bed has an electrical outlet and reading light. Our double rooms are the same price for one or two people, and feature a large double bed, desk, chair and wardrobe. Our private rooms have views of Vallila's historic wooden house district.Address: Sturenkatu 27B 2nd floor, 00510 Helsinki, FinlandPhone: +358 (0) 45 845 6188site link: http://www.cheapsleep.fi/

name: Teddy bear hostel in riga - latvia
description:
Located in the very heart of Old Riga (VecRiga), family owned, very safe and peaceful.Teddy’s Riga takes a pride to reside in renowned historical dwelling, The House of Johannes Reitern. Built in 1684-1688 by rich town hall member Johann Reitern and by city architect R. Bindenschuh, Northern-Baroque style masterpiece boasts elaborate stone carvings along main splendid façade on Mārstaļu street. The house was completely restored in 1986-1990, so no need to worry about crumbling ceiling.As the building is of major historical importance, certain modern amenities are limited or restricted by the law. Both Teddy and you shall be reaching the home on foot, elevators were not invented in the year 1688!! Everyone needs some exercise, so take your steps up and return from Riga more healthy and fit! Reception and dorm rooms are set up on third floor; double rooms are on forth floor. No-one resides on floors one, two and three, so you have the whole space for your own fun! For most adventurous guests we keep the keys of cellar and romantic attic, which can be privately admired.Exact FREE facilities included in your stay are:
free wi-fi,free PC/Internet,free herbal tea unbounded supply,free continental =simple breakfast,free clean linen/pillows,free blankets,free power converters at reception,free hairdryer in each bath,free Riga guide maps,free luggage storage,fully equipped kitchens with fridge, oven for special cake, wine bottles openers, microwave,two fully equipped bathrooms,washing machine for nominal charge,necessities (like shampoo) for nominal charge,24-hours reception with dedicated staff, speaking English, Latvian, Russian.Address: 3, Vecpilsētas, Riga, LatviaPhone: +371-672-29-250site link: http://www.teddyhostelriga.com/

name: Pacific tradewinds hostel - san francisco
description:
A small, friendly San Francisco Backpacker Hostel.For some travellers the journey is more important than the destination and who you meet is more important than the sights you see. Pacific Tradewinds Backpacker Hostel was specifically designed for fun loving, social, international travelers who truly enjoy hosteling. If you are this type of traveler and like to make new friends, we'd love to meet you and welcome you to this unique community for international travelers.We provide a full range of services and features to make your stay really comfortable. Our kitchen is modern and fully equipped for making real meals. The bathrooms are bright, clean and private. Beds are made of solid steel (which means no shaking or squeaking) and have backpack sized lockers underneath.Finally, the location is great. We are located just 2 blocks from the Downtown Transamerica Pyramid, one block from the Cable Cars, a few blocks from Chinatown and North Beach, and buses to everywhere are just outside our door.
This hostel is primarily popular with 'off-the-beaten-path' backpackers and these are the sort of travelers we love to have. We frequently fill up early in the day, so it's best to make a reservation for at least your first night.  If you are not sure when you'll be in San Francisco, give us a call when you arrive since we always try to save a few beds for spontaneous travelers.If you pay with Bitcoins, you will get 10 percent off.  Please see our 
FAQ for more information about reserving and paying by Bitcoin.Address: 680 Sacramento Street, San Francisco, CA 94111, USAPhone: +1 (415) 433-7970Toll-Free (Within U.S.): 1-888-734-6783site link: http://www.san-francisco-hostel.com/

description: Penthouse Colombia is the only real luxurious Penthouse available for short term rental in Cartagena de Indias Colombia.The Penthouse is fully registered with the Colombian Ministry of Tourism and operated by a North American owned Tourist Corporation so our guests can be certain that their reservation is safe and secure.The Penthouse Colombia has a private 400 square foot rooftop terrace with a fully functional computer controlled Hot-Tub that was purchased in Miami and imported into Colombia. The rooftop terrace connects directly to the Penthouse's entertainment center allowing our guests to enjoy their favorite music while sitting in the Hot-Tub overlooking the Caribbean Sea. The Penthouse owns the entire top floor of the building and there are no other buildings overlooking the terrace so our guests have complete privacy while enjoying the outdoor areas.Our 2000+ square foot beach-front Penthouse is located in the absolute safest area of Colombia only 100 meters from the Cartagena Hilton Hotel. The building has 24-hour security, private pool, private parking and sits directly on the beach. When we say “directly on the beach” we do not mean it is “close by” or that the beach “can be seen” -we mean that the building sits directly on the Caribbean Sea with it's own exclusive beach! Penthouse jacuzzi bathroom The Penthouse has all the amenities one would expect to find in the most high-end Colombian hotels. All 3 bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms with unlimited hot water (something rare in Cartagena), King Size (2 meter by 2 meter) cushion-pillow beds from the highest quality manufacturer, completely independent air conditioning systems in all rooms, LCD televisions, private safes, local and International telephone systems and a whole lot more. There are just too many things to list so please take the full apartment tour and see exactly what the Penthouse offers. You will not be disappointed. There is no other rental apartment in Cartagena that compares to the level of perfection that you will find from Penthouse Colombia.Address: Cr 1, Edificia Playamar #1301, El Laguito, Cartagena de Indias, ColombiaPhone: +57 314 615 5653site link: http://www.penthouse.co/

It is surrounded by trendy, fun and great restaurants, cafes, bars, music venues, shops and clubs within a few blocks.THE APARTMENTIt is an entire apartment with privacy (No share!), on the 3rd floor (No Elevator), and about 25sqm on which 3 guests can comfortably sleep. name: Mtgox
description: MtGox, called "Mount Gox" or "MTGOX", has been the most widely used bitcoin currency exchange market since it was started, and remains the largest in terms of popularity and volume.A registrant on MtGox has at least two sub-accounts: one for bitcoins (BTC), and one for US dollars (USD or MTGUSD) or other national currency. Bitcoins are bought using funds from the trader's national currency account, and the proceeds from the sale of bitcoins are deposited into the same account. Trading must always involve bitcoins as trading between different national currencies is not offered.Trades on Mt. Gox's execute from balances on deposit with the exchange which in turn makes trading on the market instantaneous, compared to some other Bitcoin markets where a subsequent settlement occurs manually between the trading partners. The disadvantage of this is that a third party must be trusted with keeping the money safe.MtGox was originally started by Jed McCaleb in July 2010, and was sold to Tibanne Co. in Japan in March 2011. It is currently operated by Tibanne Co., managed by Mark Karpeles (MagicalTux).site link: https://mtgox.com/Choose carefully any service that store and manage funds for you.
